beer_brewer_name: Coney Island Brewing Company (Boston Beer Company)
review_blob:
Pours golden  smells of vanilla, for sure flavor of malt,fruits and some spices
A tasty pilsener great color as well.
A great summer pale ale with balanced flavor and aroma look forward to the day this is caned or bottled and can be enjoyed on the beach aside from growler on ice
beer_name: Great South Bay Robert Moses Pale Ale

review_blob: Blue points best for sure. Yet to go to the brewery but this is found reliably easy around NY  area.

A Amber ale that never fails. A home for barrier-brewing comp
My personal favorite.
